post.title: Cosplay Mania 2022 to Host Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie
post.content:
Cosplay Mania 2022, an annual cosplay convention in the Philippines, is set to host Hololive Indonesia's Ayunda Risu and Kureiji Ollie this October.

We invited our very first VTuber back in 2019, and for ðŸŽ†Cosplay Mania 2022ðŸŽ†, we'll be flying in not just one, but two VTubers from @hololive_Id! Making her first visit to the Philippines, let's give it up for @ayunda_risu!#CosplayMania2022 #Cosplayph #hololivemeet #holomeet pic.twitter.com/PBKsu779iQ

— Cosplay Mania (@CosplayManiaPH) August 13, 2022

Risu from HoloID first generation is known best for her content, including the 30-day Non-Stop Nut November clips and classic stream where she counts the coins inside HoloID genmate Moona Hoshinova's coin bank without permission.

Aside from this, she has released songs such as ALiCE&u, Harapan PanPanPan with Holostars' Aragami Oga, and HI-15 with Moona and Airani Iofifteen. This is set to be Risu's first visit to the Philippines.

We invited our very first VTuber back in 2019, and for ðŸŽ†Cosplay Mania 2022ðŸŽ†, we'll be flying in not just one, but two VTubers from @hololive_Id!
Let's make sure to give a huge Filipino welcome to @kureijiollie#CosplayMania2022 #Cosplayph #hololivemeet #holomeet pic.twitter.com/NmFgfkzgmm

— Cosplay Mania (@CosplayManiaPH) August 13, 2022

Kureiji Ollie from HoloID second generation made waves as the second VTuber from Indonesia to reach her million-subscriber milestone, next to Moona. This zombie VTuber finished 6th in the Tournament Arc 2 chess competition organized by Chess.com. She also showed her mathematics skills on stream multiple times.

Cosplay Mania happens on the weekend of October 1-2, 2022 at SMX Convention Center Manila, Pasay City, Metro Manila, Philippines. Visit facebook.com/CosplayMania for more details.

node.description: Slime alien VTuber and Kawa colleague PiaPi Yuefo shares her experience at the recent Nijisanji EN Animate Cafe collaboration.
